articles.description: Manchester City have lost just once so far this season, but have been inconsistent with their performances amid an ever-growing injury list.
articles.content:
Twelve games, eight wins, three draws, and that defeat to Leicester.
It's been a mixed bag for Manchester City so far this season, with an unusually high number of injuries preventing Pep Guardiola … [+4983 chars]

articles.title: Lo Celso, Lamela, Bale: Tottenham injury news and return dates ahead of Man City clash - Football.London
articles.description: All the latest Tottenham injury news ahead of Spurs' Premier League clash with Manchester City after the international break
articles.content:
For 123 minutes Spurs were top of the Premier League this weekend.
